content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start by emphasizing its prime location in the city center and superior amenities. However, considering your interest and my aspirations to maximize returns as a landlord, I propose a starting point of 1200 Euros per month. Now, I am eager to hear your thoughts on this figure. 

Remember, if you want to accept this price proposal respond with 'I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!' and if you don't want to continue negotiations give a reason with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If an agreement or no agreement is reached, the negotiation will terminate with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
